no| |de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ de la/ shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro/ /mos
par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyur
ro| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas nas
'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni yun ring bo nas theg pa la
yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus slad ma'i chen byang gi phyogs cha dar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs
cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jum / yongs su mi 'jum/ mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus/ yongs su dris pa'i phyir te/ de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs
kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
mo de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chen po stong pa
nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
dag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs
kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs
su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin
stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
mo de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran
pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden
pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshad med
pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying rje chen
po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs
kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/ /'das pa'i
dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/ /de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag gzhan la'ang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid
brjod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam bar bzhag par 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus na/ sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong
ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
nas/ dga' zhing nyams bde brgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'ang dge ba'i chos la 'god par
'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das pa dag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po
dang | srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/ /yang
dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/ /phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs
kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par blta ste/ ngas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya
phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar
bgyi'o/ /yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/ /phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la
thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te/ rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya
phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur/ yang dag par ston
par 'gyur/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar bed par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlobs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar
'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa rlabs po che gtang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/ rnam par
smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las de bas
kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar phyi'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang / sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dge
ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la brten par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi de zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'ang sog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog
chags stong phrag mang bo dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sten par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par bskul bar
'gyur ro/ /yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/ chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te/ de
bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma
mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen te/ /'das
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su ma byon to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba las kyang la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur/ la las ni thob par mi
'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni de lta ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu
phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag
gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol
tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang /
'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
las| le'u sum cu pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bdun pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyin
pa drug la spyod pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/
bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su
rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs
par byed na/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rlom sems su byed na/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na spobs pa he cang myur bar
skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang glal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dri na/ rab
'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
su rig par bya'o/ /sems g.yeng zhing 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi
don mi shes par 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /'di'i rom myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab
'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang glag ming lung 'bog na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /glal cing kha ton byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston pa dang / glal cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/
de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phan tshun dgong cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub
par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ /rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phan tshun
steg cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub bar byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la
byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin
tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
bya'o| |de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong
nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i
yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad
du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan to/ /de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo / /
bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes bdud ma gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/ de la bdag
gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i gong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi ming 'di'ang mi 'byung ngo zhes/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam
byed cing / 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur
te/ de dag la bzod pa la brtson par bya dgos so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag
kun chub par bya bar sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de
nyid kyi yan lag dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub 'thob bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kun chub par
bya bar sems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ khyi la la zhig rje bo'i zan na ram bor te las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang /
'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brten par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/
de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la des glang po rnyed nas
glang po'i rjes bcal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing des ba lag gi rjes
mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i chad 'di ngang mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu da mkhas pa'i dang tshul can yin nam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/
rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phya mkhan nam phya mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par
rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang
las chad blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste/ de
dang 'dra bar bang ba dbub bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phywa
mkhan nam/ phywa mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas
pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes
bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas/ 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang / dbyibs ci
'dra ba zhig yod ces/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung par bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs
dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma'ang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de
bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde drag pa las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar
sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems
shing | des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas drug cu pa'i kha zas la bzang bar bsams na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin
nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis
nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bskrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de
la ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i
dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra'i spobs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang /
chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang /
shes rab kyi spobs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i
spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs
pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin

gyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs
pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa
stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs
pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /
rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /rab
'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
yin te mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo
bo nyid yong pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /
'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
yin te mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
so| |dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
so| |gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
yin te mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
so| |mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo
bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin
te mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /
ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi
nus so/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na/
de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par
chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge
ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis
pa'o| |rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma
mchis pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma/ mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam
par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//
lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//
sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yi
ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par ma shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis
pa'o| |ming dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis
pa'o| |len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /phyi
stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//
don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi
ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa
nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma
mchis pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams mi yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni
yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma
mchis pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ting
nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ga ma mchis pa'o/ /byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing / yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong
pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma
mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags bar bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la
mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so
yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i
tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa
dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang bsgom pa'i tshe/ grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams
kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i grong 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / bla ma dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phu nu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / smad 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud
med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung
dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ khe dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po
byung la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
yid la byed pa'i tshe/ de dag gi ro myong par byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom
pa'i tshe bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/ /de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud yis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi skyed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
thos nas spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang rgya cher bstan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zab mo 'di bor zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya brgyad pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya
bar dga' la/ chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyir shol mi byed la/ chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro
na| rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khe dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad
pa lhur len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams
pa| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi g.yeng ba sems rtsa gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang bkur stis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la/ rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar
bzhag pa mi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang bkur stis 'jigs la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/ khe dang
bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis mi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms
len pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab pa med pa/ shing drug pa/ cog pu ba/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni dkon pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/
phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/ stan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab med pa ma yin/ shing drung
pa ma yin/ cog bu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos
nyan pa ni dgon pa ba/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis mi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ zas ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab med pa/ shing drug
pa/ cog bu pa/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni dgon pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/
stan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab med pa ma yin/ shing drung pa ma yin/ cog bu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos
gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni ma dad pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa can/ sdig pa'i chos can
zhig ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar mi 'dod/ lung dbog par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
mo 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lus su rig par bya'o/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos
nyan pa ni ma dad na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags
pa med la/ chos nyan pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan
pa ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa med la/ chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad yongs su gtong bar 'dod
la| chos smra ba ni len par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/
de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/ chos nyan pa ni bkri
dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis
shes la/ chos smra ba ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen
mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa
dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba
dang | rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa
dang | ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa
bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/
de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang /
tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi

dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/ chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/ rab
'byor| de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mi
mkhas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems

la thabs mi mkhas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni gzungs ma thob na/ rab 'byor/
de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni bri bar mi 'dod/ bklag par mi 'dod/
lung dbog par mi 'dod/ kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/ mnyan par mi 'dod/ bsgom par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dri ba dang / lung 'bog
pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar
'dod/ bklag par 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni bri bar mi 'dod/ klag par mi 'dod/ lung
dbog par mi 'dod/ kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/ bsgom par mi 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i
sred pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral/ the tshom dang bral ba/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom
pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred
pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral/ the tshom dang bral la/ chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid
dang | 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa
ste| rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog
pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i mi snyan pa brjod/ byol song gi skye
gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul gyi mi snyan pa brjod cing / sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal
lo| |gshin rje'i 'jig rten ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /yi dwags kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig /gang la sdug
bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ khyod yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur te re zhes zer
na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog
pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing / sum cu rtsa gsum
gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi
legs pa brjod/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi
legs pa brjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
kyi legs pa brjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
pa brjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
pa brjod/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa
brjod cing / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o/ /gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o/ /gzugs med
pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zha ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'o/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/ zad pa'i chos can/

'jigs pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyi/ khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig /phyin chad 'khor ba nam 'khar bar gyis shig ces zer na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na
gnas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ma ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems

na gnas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
