ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems
can rnams la chos ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /ma rig pa'i
stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med par ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya
bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /ming dang gzugs

kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar
sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /reg pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa
ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /sred pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to//
len pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /srid pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes
bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /skye ba'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rga shi'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba
med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems
can rnams la chos ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
phyin pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid
ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo
zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston
to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/
de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams
la chos ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa
nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong
ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba
med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes
bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba
med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya
bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /dngos
po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa
nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi
'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams
la chos ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi stong pa nyid na 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong
ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong
ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /tshad
med pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni
'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar
sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /mthar gyis ngas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la
chos ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos
ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid
ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi
'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems
can rnams la chos ston to/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi
'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos
ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba
med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems
can rnams la chos ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid ni
'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya
bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /
rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams
kyi lam du gyur pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
'gro ba'i ma 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med
pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de
las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi
dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs
so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni dang bde tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
chos thams cad ni sgra brnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra brnyan la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni
mig yor gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig yor la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan
gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs brnyan la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni smig rgyu'i ngang tshul can
te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smig rgyu la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni chu zla'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul
de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu zla la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni dbyung ba dang mi dbyung ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni
ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbyung ba dang mi dbyung ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni dbri ba dang
bsnan pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba dang bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba'am ma 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams
cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ong ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad
ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya nyer bzhi pa/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni phrad pa med pa dang 'bral ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de
dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phrad pa med pa dang 'bral ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni 'dri ba med
pa dang mi 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ /de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dre ba med pa dang mi 'ong ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul can te/ /de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta
ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni sems can gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems can nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la
'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni srog gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ srog nyid kyang shin tu
med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'gro
ba nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni gso ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ gso ba nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni skyes bu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ skyes bu nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni gang zag gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang
tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gang zag nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni
shed can gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shed can nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos
thams cad ni shed bdag gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shed bdag nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong
ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni byed pa po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byed pa po nyid kyang shin tu
med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni byed du 'jug pa po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
byed du 'jug pa po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni slong ba po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ slong ba po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni yongs su slong ba po'i ngang tshul
can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yongs su slong ba bo nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams
cad ni tshor ba po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ tshor ba po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni tshor bar byed pa po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ tshor bar byed pa po nyid kyang shin tu med
na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni shes pa po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
shes pa po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mthong ba po'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mthong ba po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag
ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni
bde ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bde ba nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga
la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la
'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sdug pa nyid
kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de
las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sdug bsngal nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'i ngang
tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/
chos thams cad ni mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las ma 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mi sdug pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga
la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dod chags kyi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med
na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ zhe sdang gi dngos
po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ gti mug gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul
de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid
kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings
kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos
thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab
'byor/ chos thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so//
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni ma g.yo ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos
gang la'ang g.yo ba med de/ 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni tshor ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las
mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ tshor ba nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni 'du shes kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang
tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'du shes nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni 'du byed kyi ngang tshul
can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'du byed nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni

chos thams cad ni lce'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lce nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/

gi rnam par shes ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/

ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ tshul khrims

yongs su bzung ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang

pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang byang chub kyang
shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/
de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag
gis/ sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos ba de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ldang ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod
kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan
thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems
can nyi tshe nyung zad zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci'ang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du'ang bsgom par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan
'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad
bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa
phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig bsgom pa rnam

'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// //shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug
dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod
pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes
yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi
dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga'
la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab
'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang /
bzung shing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par
mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par
mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol
ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ mtshan ma med pa
la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i
bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ gzugs
brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam
pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye
ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis
pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa
dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol
ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog par 'gyur/ /smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la
gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags
sam/ mig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags
sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa
lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i
rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la
rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te
reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams
la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i
khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/
ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags
sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa
lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog
pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong
pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ don dam
pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po
med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags
sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la
rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no//
tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba
la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sgra la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /dri la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ro la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi
rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus
te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin
no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma
yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chu'i khams
la rtog pa ma yin no/ /me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin
no/ /ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye
mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /len pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /srid pa la rtog pa
ma yin no/ /skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong
pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa
ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mi dmigs

pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin
no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams la rtog
pa ma yin no/ /stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin
no/ /thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song / phyogs na'ang
mi gnas/ yul na'ang mi gnas/ gang na'ang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gang la grangs mi dmigs shing / 'gro ba dang
'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /'du shes kyis ma yin no/ /'du byed kyis ma yin
no/ /rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /mig gis ma yin no/ /rna bas ma yin no/ /snas ma yin no/ /lces ma yin no/ /lus kyis ma yin no/ /yid kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs kyis
ma yin no/ /sgras ma yin no/ /dris ma yin no/ /ros ma yin no/ /reg gis ma yin no/ /chos kyis ma yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /sna'i
rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /chu'i khams
kyis ma yin no/ /me'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /ma rig pas ma yin
no/ /'du byed kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /skye mched drug gis ma yin no/ /reg pas ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /sred pas
ma yin no/ /len pas ma yin no/ /srid pas ma yin no/ /skye bas ma yin no/ /rga shis ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
no| |chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /chos
thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
no| |ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
kyis ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no/ /stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no/ /tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i
sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
kyis ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ byams pa chen
pos ma yin no/ /snying rje chen pos ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bus ma yin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang byang chub kyis ma yin no/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam
par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna nyid kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid

nyid gcig pa'o/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
nyid gcig pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi stong pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
gcig pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dran pa nye
bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba
rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin
nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
gcig pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bsam gtan
rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
nyid gcig pa'o/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /snying rje
chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes
so/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs
so/ /sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
dri'o/ /ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyang reg go /chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna
ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//
lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg
pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du
byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /skye mched
drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong
pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po
stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus
byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das
pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos
thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong
pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan
nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /
ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so
yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen
po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin
nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba'i de
bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'du
